name: Hawaiian Ham and Pineapple Salsa
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Get party-ready with our Hawaiian Ham and Pineapple Salsa. A fruity salsa of pineapple, jalapeño and mango nectar is the perfect base for salty chunks of cooked canned ham seasoned with Grill Mates® Baja Citrus Marinade. Serve it inside hollowed out pineapple bowls for a festive touch.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package McCormick® Grill Mates® Baja Citrus Marinade
½ cup mango nectar or orange juice
1 (12 ounce) can canned ham, such as Spam® Classic, cut into small cubes
½ cup finely chopped red onion
directions: Mix Marinade Mix, mango nectar, honey and lime juice in large bowl
Remove 1/4 cup of the marinade mixture; set aside
Cook cubed canned ham and 1/4 cup of the reserved marinade mixture in large skillet on medium heat until lightly browned
Stir pineapple, onion and jalapeno into remaining marinade mixture in large bowl until well blended
